text.p: Resurgence Properties Inc said Wednesday its board had approved a plan of liquidation and dissolution that will be submitted to shareholders for approval.

The plan includes ceasing all business activities other than those that further the dissolution plan, the sale or disposition of all company assets, the satisfaction of all outstanding liabilities, and the payment of liquidating distributions to shareholders in complete redemption of the common stock, the company said.
A shareholder meeting is expected to be held during the third quarter, it said.
The company said the plan includes the filing of articles of dissolution.
It said the board had agreed to extend the management agreement with Wexford Management LLC under a reduced fee arrangement through year-end.
Resurgence is engaged in diversified real estate activities.
